languages.text: "Демоны хотели, чтобы мы слышали их гнусные речи? Пусть же сами услышат наш праведный клич! {name}, позволь мне созвать самых ретивых проповедников, которые посвятят свои жизнь и рвение чтению литании гнева и ярости над сим механизмом. Пусть обитатели варпа слышат нашу речь и страшатся ее!"

"The daemons wanted us to hear their vile speeches? Let them hear our righteous cry! {name}, let me summon the most zealous preachers who would dedicate their lives and zeal to reading a litany of fury and rage to this machine. Let the inhabitants of the warp hear our voice and fear us!"
languages.original_text: "Демоны хотели, чтобы мы слышали их гнусные речи? Пусть же сами услышат наш праведный клич! {name}, позволь мне созвать самых ретивых проповедников, которые посвятят свои жизнь и рвение чтению литании гнева и ярости над сим механизмом. Пусть обитатели варпа слышат нашу речь и страшатся ее!"

traits.locale_text: "The demons wanted us to hear their vile speeches? Let them hear our righteous cry!{name}, let me summon the most zealous preachers who would dedicate their lives and zeal to reading the litany of anger and rage to this machine. Let the inhabitants of the Warp hear us and fear us!"

"The demons wanted us to hear their vile speeches? Let them hear our righteous cry!{name}, let me summon the most zealous preachers who would dedicate their lives and zeal to reading the litany of anger and rage to this machine. Let the inhabitants of the Warp hear us and fear us!"

"The daemons wanted us to hear their vile speeches? Let them hear our righteous cry! {name}, let me summon the most zealous preachers who would dedicate their lives and zeal to reading a litany of fury and rage to this machine. Let the inhabitants of the warp hear our voice and fear us!"

languages.text: “那些恶魔想让我们聆听他们恶毒的话语？不如让他们听听我们正义的战吼吧！{name}，请允许我召集最热忱的布道士，他们将奉献自己的生命与热情，向这台机器宣读盛怒祷文。让亚空间的居民听到我们的声音，让它们惧怕我们吧！”
languages.original_text: "The daemons wanted us to hear their vile speeches? Let them hear our righteous cry! {name}, let me summon the most zealous preachers who would dedicate their lives and zeal to reading a litany of fury and rage to this machine. Let the inhabitants of the warp hear our voice and fear us!"

traits.locale_text: “那些恶魔想让我们聆听他们恶毒的话语？不如让他们听听我们正义的战吼吧！{name}，请允许我召集最热忱的布道士，他们将奉献自己的生命与热情，向这台机器宣读盛怒祷文。让亚空间的居民听到我们的声音，让它们惧怕我们吧！”
“那些恶魔想让我们聆听他们恶毒的话语？不如让他们听听我们正义的战吼吧！{name}，请允许我召集最热忱的布道士，他们将奉献自己的生命与热情，向这台机器宣读盛怒祷文。让亚空间的居民听到我们的声音，让它们惧怕我们吧！”

languages.text: «¿Los daemon querían que escucháramos sus viles discursos? ¡Que oigan nuestro clamor justo! {name}, permítame convocar a los predicadores más fervorosos para que dediquen su vida y su fe a leer una letanía de furia y rabia a esta máquina. ¡Que los habitantes de la disformidad nos oigan y nos teman!».
languages.original_text: "The daemons wanted us to hear their vile speeches? Let them hear our righteous cry! {name}, let me summon the most zealous preachers who would dedicate their lives and zeal to reading a litany of fury and rage to this machine. Let the inhabitants of the warp hear our voice and fear us!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Los daemon querían que escucháramos sus viles discursos? ¡Que oigan nuestro clamor justo! {name}, permítame convocar a los predicadores más fervorosos para que dediquen su vida y su fe a leer una letanía de furia y rabia a esta máquina. ¡Que los habitantes de la disformidad nos oigan y nos teman!».

languages.text: 「悪魔たちは、自分たちの卑劣な会話を私たちに聞かせたかったのだろうか？奴らに私たちの正義の叫びを聞かせよう！{name}、この機械に怒りと憤怒の連祷を読み聞かせることに命と熱意を捧げるような、一番熱心なプリーチャーを召喚しよう。<歪み>の住人たちに我々の声を聞かせ、恐れさせるのだ！」
languages.original_text: "The daemons wanted us to hear their vile speeches? Let them hear our righteous cry! {name}, let me summon the most zealous preachers who would dedicate their lives and zeal to reading a litany of fury and rage to this machine. Let the inhabitants of the warp hear our voice and fear us!"

traits.locale_text: 「悪魔たちは、自分たちの卑劣な会話を私たちに聞かせたかったのだろうか？奴らに私たちの正義の叫びを聞かせよう！{name}、この機械に怒りと憤怒の連祷を読み聞かせることに命と熱意を捧げるような、一番熱心なプリーチャーを召喚しよう。<歪み>の住人たちに我々の声を聞かせ、恐れさせるのだ！」
「悪魔たちは、自分たちの卑劣な会話を私たちに聞かせたかったのだろうか？奴らに私たちの正義の叫びを聞かせよう！{name}、この機械に怒りと憤怒の連祷を読み聞かせることに命と熱意を捧げるような、一番熱心なプリーチャーを召喚しよう。<歪み>の住人たちに我々の声を聞かせ、恐れさせるのだ！」

languages.text: « Les démons voulaient nous susurrer leurs horreurs à l'oreille ? Faisons-leur plutôt entendre les rugissements de notre vertueuse colère ! {name}, permettez-moi de convoquer des prêcheurs parmi les plus dévoués, qui consacreront leur vie à réciter religieusement une litanie de colère et de rage à travers cette machine. Ainsi, les habitants du Warp entendront notre voix et trembleront ! »
languages.original_text: "The daemons wanted us to hear their vile speeches? Let them hear our righteous cry! {name}, let me summon the most zealous preachers who would dedicate their lives and zeal to reading a litany of fury and rage to this machine. Let the inhabitants of the warp hear our voice and fear us!"

traits.locale_text: « Les démons voulaient nous susurrer leurs horreurs à l'oreille ? Faisons-leur plutôt entendre les rugissements de notre vertueuse colère ! {name}, permettez-moi de convoquer des prêcheurs parmi les plus dévoués, qui consacreront leur vie à réciter religieusement une litanie de colère et de rage à travers cette machine. Ainsi, les habitants du Warp entendront notre voix et trembleront ! »

languages.text: "Die Dämonen wollten, dass wir ihre widerwärtigen Reden hören? Sollen sie unseren rechtschaffenen Schrei hören! {name}, lasst mich die fanatischsten Prediger versammeln, die ihr Leben und ihren Eifer der Aufgabe widmen, dieser Maschine eine Litanei von Wut und Zorn vorzulesen. Die Bewohner des Warp sollen unsere Stimme hören und uns fürchten!"
languages.original_text: "The daemons wanted us to hear their vile speeches? Let them hear our righteous cry! {name}, let me summon the most zealous preachers who would dedicate their lives and zeal to reading a litany of fury and rage to this machine. Let the inhabitants of the warp hear our voice and fear us!"

Die Bewohner des Warp sollen unsere Stimme hören und uns fürchten!"

"Die Dämonen wollten, dass wir ihre widerwärtigen Reden hören? Sollen sie unseren rechtschaffenen Schrei hören! {name}, lasst mich die fanatischsten Prediger versammeln, die ihr Leben und ihren Eifer der Aufgabe widmen, dieser Maschine eine Litanei von Wut und Zorn vorzulesen. Die Bewohner des Warp sollen uns hören und uns fürchten!"

languages.text: "Yani iblisler, melun sözlerini bize duyurmak mı istemiş? Haklı haykırışımızı duysunlar o vakit! Müsaade et {name}, ömürlerini ve imanlarını bu makineye gazap ilahileri okumaya adayacak vaizler çağırtayım. Öteboyuttakiler sesimizi duysun, bizden korksun!"
languages.original_text: "The daemons wanted us to hear their vile speeches? Let them hear our righteous cry! {name}, let me summon the most zealous preachers who would dedicate their lives and zeal to reading a litany of fury and rage to this machine. Let the inhabitants of the warp hear our voice and fear us!"

traits.locale_text: "Yani iblisler, melun sözlerini bize duyurmak mı istemiş? Haklı haykırışımızı duysunlar o vakit! Müsaade et {name}, ömürlerini ve imanlarını bu makineye gazap ilahileri okumaya adayacak vaizler çağırtayım. Öteboyuttakiler sesimizi duysun, bizden korksun!"
